article_title: Must-see morning clip: Does Dan Snyder understand that “Redskins” is offensive, yet?
article_text:
Topics: D.C., Football, Must see morning clip, Native Americans, us patent office, Video, Washington, Washington Redskins, Entertainment News

Hey, Dan Snyder, do you get it yet? The term “Redskins” is offensive! Native Americans have told you so, Barack Obama has told you so, Twitter has told you so, Jon Stewart has told you so, and now the U.S. Patent Office has told you so, too. Well, in case you don’t, somehow, understand the racist origins of the term, Stewart breaks it down for you again on “The Daily Show”:

article_metadata.description: Probably not, so here's another explanation from Jon Stewart VIDEO

Well, in case you don’t, somehow, understand the racist origins of the term, Stewart breaks it down for you again on “The Daily Show”:
The term “Redskins” is offensive!
Native Americans have told you so, Barack Obama has told you so, Twitter has told you so, Jon Stewart has told you so, and now the U.S. Patent Office has told you so, too.
